name: Dolce Italia Vegetable Lasagna
description: This vegetarian lasagna is crafted from vegetable-sauce pasta gratin made from freshly grown Sri Lankan ingredients, is a much loved comfort food, easy to warm up in just a few minutes, and contains no preservatives, dyes or sugar.  Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
